headline: Eversource acquires Mystic Property from Constellation Energy, no terms
summary: With a focus on helping to enable Massachusetts’ unprecedented clean energy transition while ensuring safe, reliable service for customers across New England, Eversource (ES) has acquired a 26-acre portion of the Mystic property from Constellation Energy (CEG). Eversource has not developed specific plans for the site at this time, but its strategic location, historic use, and existing infrastructure uniquely position it as a potential multi-use energy interconnection hub for large-scale renewabl
